```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
data = read.csv("gapminder-5060.csv")
```

```{r}
rel = data %>% filter(country == "China" | country == "Guatemala" | country == "Morocco")
rel %>% ggplot(aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = country)) + geom_line() + ggtitle("Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita")
```
